import React from 'react' import { Card,Button, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({product}) => { return ( 40?"card-title1":"card-title2"} > {product.name.length >50 ?product.name.substring(0,50) + "..." : product.name}
{product.brand.toUpperCase().length >10 ?product.brand.toUpperCase().substring(0,10) + "..." : product.brand.toUpperCase()}
{product.rating}*
{product.price}
) } export default Product
